Recon sees the log coming right for him, he quickly reaches for his sword, 
jumps up and slices the log right donw the middle. He lands on one of the 
fallen log halves and turns to face Aerotaur. "I shall not tolerate that 
from you. Even if I miss you with my energon blasts you will still have to 
change to beast mode or go into stasis lock," Recon tells him and releases 
the energon charges he had stored up, right at Aerotaur.
